casebody.data:
Second Department,

February, 1960

(February 1, 1960) Rector, Churchwardens and Vestrymen of the Church of the Holy Trinity, Brooklyn, Appellants, v. Manufacturers Trust Company et al., Defendants, and Lewis G. Reynolds et al., Respondents.

Motion for leave to appeal to the Court of Appeals denied. Present — Nolan, P. J., Kleinfeld, Christ, Pette and Brennan, JJ.
